item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

                for(int i = 0; i < 10000; i++) {
     if(npcType == i) {
                        sendNpcChat2(""+c.getChat().Randomizer(), "", c.talkingNpc, "");
     }
}

This is the code in my action handler.
No compiling errors but ingame I get this.

liek.png778×553

Keep in mind im using a 2D STRING array

this is the randomizer method.

	public static String[] Randomizer() {
		return Chat[(int) (Math.random() * Chat.length)];
	}

and this is the method it’s pulling it from.

		case 2338:
		sendNpcChat2(""+c.getChat().Randomizer(),"",c.talkingNpc,"");
		break;
